ObjectAttribute.text: 5,5 years of strong SAP ABAP development experience in FI, CO, SD, MM, TRM, PM, QM, FS-CM modules
Experience in ABAP/4 interfaces development, data conversions, enhancements, repairs, BADI and User Exits
Extensively worked on interactive reports, ALV and dialog programming
Knowledge and experience on UI5-Fiori development
Good experience on ABAP/4 object programming
Heavy good experience in data dictionary
Experienced in using various modularization techniques like subroutines, function modules, RFCâ€™s and class modules
Experienced in creating and using CDS views
Good experience in dialog programming, designing and developing layouts and forms using SMARTFORMS and ADOBEFORMS
Expertise in performance analysis and tuning using various debugging tools like run time analysis and SQL trace
Request transportations and object compatibilities between different clients and systems
Good Experience using ABAP/4 Workbench Tools, reporting, customization, conversion and data extraction
Excellent trouble shooting and debugging skills
Excellent communication and time management skills with strong analytical, problem solving and decision making capability
Good understanding of both business processes and technical development
